error.no_devices_found: There are no devices paired with this Nintendo account, go to [Nintendo Support]({more_info_url}) for further assistance.

data_description.api_token: The link copied from the Nintendo website

reauth_confirm.description: To obtain your access token, click [Nintendo Login]({link}) to sign in to your Nintendo account. Then, for the account you want to link, right-click on the red **Select this person** button and choose **Copy Link Address**.

data_description.api_token: The link copied from the Nintendo website

user.description: To obtain your access token, click [Nintendo Login]({link}) to sign in to your Nintendo account. Then, for the account you want to link, right-click on the red **Select this person** button and choose **Copy Link Address**.

bedtime_alarm_out_of_range.message: {value} not accepted. Bedtime Alarm must be between {bedtime_alarm_min} and {bedtime_alarm_max}. To disable, set to {bedtime_alarm_disable}.

no_devices_found.message: No Nintendo devices found for this account.
